title: Save this life
brief_description: The back-pressure arm-lift method of artificial respiration is shown by an instruction to Boy Scouts The correct position in which to place the patent and the position of the rescuer in relation to the patient is explained and the slow rhythmic action required is demonstrated with step-by-step commentary .
